non_residential_details.development_type: Change of Use with Extension(s) over 999sqm

description: Demolition of all existing buildings and structures and the erection of four buildings of between 1 and 15 storeys in height; comprising a minimum of 3,202sqm of business use (Class B1), 517sqm flexible floorspace (Class A1, A3 and B1), 444sqm flexible floorspace (Class D1, D2, B1), a replacement waste facility (Sui Generis) and 79 residential units (Class C3), hard and soft landscaping; servicing facilities; parking; cycle parking; ancillary and enabling works, plant and equipment and associated development.
